scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean:all: docker-compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker system prune -af && docker volume prune -f
scripts.health:all: npm run health && curl -f https://kartofan.online && curl -f http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live
scripts.test:local: curl -f http://localhost:8100/test && curl -f http://localhost:3100 && curl -f http://localhost:9000/minio/health/live
scripts.test:production: curl -f https://kartofan.online/api/health && curl -f https://kartofan.online && curl -f https://kartofan.online/media/
scripts.docker:clean: docker container prune -f && docker image prune -f
scripts.monitor: watch -n 5 'docker-compose ps && echo "" && curl -s https://kartofan.online/api/health | jq .'
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cp .env.example .env.production && echo 'Please configure .env.production before deployment'
scripts.cert:renew: sudo certbot renew --nginx && sudo systemctl reload nginx
